description: Department of Fisheries and Oceans (DFO)  requires supply and delivery of Snowmobile
full_summary:
## Government Tender Announcement - Snowmobile

### Tender Details

* **Reference Number**: WS3816576390
* **Amendment Number**: 1
* **Publication Date**: March 2, 2023
* **Tender Closing Date**: May 31, 2023 at 14:00:00

### Contract Details

* **Procurement Category**: Goods (GD)
* **Procurement Method**: Competitive - Open Bidding
* **Selection Criteria**: Lowest Price
* **Trade Agreements**: Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA)
* **Regions of Delivery**: Richibucto

### Project Overview

The Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC) on behalf of the Department of Fisheries and Oceans (DFO), invites bids for the supply and delivery of two (2) Snowmobiles. The expected contract start date is June 28, 2023.

### Contact Information

* **Contact Name**: Danny Arseneau (PSPC)
* **Email Address**: danny.arseneau@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca
* **Notice URL**: <http://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/15577624?extsite=MTU1Nzc2MjRfQU4wMTQ4NDA1MDk5Mg==>

### Additional Information

This tender has been posted under the Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA) and is open to bidders from across Canada. The tender closing date is May 31, 2023 at 14:00:00. Interested bidders should review the tender documents and response to the request for proposal in accordance with the specified guidelines and timelines.

Note that I reformatted the original text into a more structured and easy-to-read format, with clear headings and concise descriptions. I also rephrased the text to ensure it is clear and free of grammatical errors. Finally, I ensured that all important details were included, but did not include any unnecessary information.  Let me know if you'd like me to make any adjustments.  The word count came in under 400 words as requested. 

Please let me know if you have any questions or further requests!
